concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: The DITA HTML5 plugin provides features for making documentation more interactive. CW - 24/03/2014 - Reworded from 'This plugin is an attempt to bring more features for people interested to make their documentations more interactive'.

conbody.p: The HTML5 plugin works differently to many other DITA-OT plugins. It allows you to build custom widgets using javascripts and css libraries of your own choice. You can use the custom widgets to enhance your documentation.
conbody.draft-comment: CW - 24/03/2014 - Reworded from 'The HTML5 plugin works a bit differently than usual DITA-OT plugins. The plugin allows you to use the javascripts and css libraries of your choice to build custom widgets for your documentations'.
